website_summaries.verdict: The queen of oil-free deep pore cleansers that deserves her crown.
pros: Mildly foaming cleanser contains salicylic acid to help clear pores
Works well on oily skin types
cons: Some users saw no results even after daily use

customer_reviews.title: By far the very best and most effective face wash I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: By far the very best and most effective face wash I have ever used. I have very bad blackheads and large pores that never unclog and clear up no matter what I do. This is the only product I have ever used that cleared it up!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Did not control oil at all for me
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this controls oil so well for anyone, but it certainly did not for me. It smells nice and I gave it three weeks of use with no results. About 15 minutes after using, my skin was oily again, even when my hair was completely away from my face.
customer_reviews.author: Arseniy Petrov

customer_reviews.title: So soothing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It's very gentle on sensitive skin and the mint cools the skin as you lather. My pores look so much smaller even after just a week of using it. A little bit prices than average brand cleansers, but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Slater

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Shipping took awhile but got here just in time for when my old one ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Lukens

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: wife swears by it. has been a happy customer for many years.
customer_reviews.author: yekkersrow

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew how this product works. I should have really paid attention to the other reviews. Cap arrived broken and I can't even get out any product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tks, Received a quality product in the most expedient manner.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best face washes I’ve used!! Skin sometimes feels dry after but it’s better than feeling oily
customer_reviews.author: Leo C.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 7 months and I still have a good deal left! It's been great for my acne (I think, you never know really). I like the smell of it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hui

customer_reviews.title: Great product that I have used for years
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I have used for years. However, the last two bottles had damages storage caps and that makes it hard to dispense and storage. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RRT

customer_reviews.title: Had higher expectations...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived BROKEN. Cap was broken and taped with SCOTCH TAPE. Very disappointed for how expensive it was.
customer_reviews.author: DancinYogi

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product on my face years and my oily face problem is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Nice item...
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I use it often. Update: 22 April 2019- I bought this again. It works good.
customer_reviews.author: scopin4u2Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face cleanser. Helps the pores and controls the acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A product worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Excellent face wash, at least for me. Pleasant fragrance without being overpowering. I don't notice a lot of residue and it, again at least for me, is gentle enough to use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite skin cleanser on earth
customer_reviews.text: My favorite skin cleanser on earth. I have oily/combination and this is so gentle and works so beautifully. Not to mention it smells as good as masculine unicorn tears.
customer_reviews.author: Cory H Klose

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of white heads
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for getting rid of those little white heads that seem to popup when I sweat so much. I like this product very much for the summer time. During the winter, I use the Checks and Balance for washing my face.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough but the container was terribly made
customer_reviews.text: Used for about two weeks before the plastic stopper broke off and couldn't be pried out. Cap doesn't twist off either so ended up spilling most of the rest trying to clumsily transfer it into another container. More overpriced bs.
customer_reviews.author: Jiamian Niu

product_meta.title: Origins Zero Oil Deep Pore Cleanser With Saw Palmetto And Mint 150ml/5oz
product_meta.description: An efficacious mildly foaming cleanser Contains skin-clearing Saw Palmetto cooling Mint & pore-reducing Salicylic Acid Helps clear pores diminish excess oil & lessen shine Leaves skin perfectly clean & invigorated
feature_bullets: Zero Oil Deep Pore Cleanser With Saw Palmetto And Mint 150ml/5oz
